name: PathTypeAlignments
shortdesc: Options for aligning text to the path's stroke.

property.name: TOP_PATH_ALIGNMENT
property.shortdesc: The text is aligned to the top of the path stroke.

property.name: BOTTOM_PATH_ALIGNMENT
property.shortdesc: The text is aligned to the bottom of the path stroke.

property.name: CENTER_PATH_ALIGNMENT
property.shortdesc: The text is aligned to the center of the path stroke.
